tool_description: Calculates final package dimensions, weight, and packaging requirements based on item specifications and packaging rules.

items.description: List of item identifiers or descriptions to be packaged

item_weights.description: Weight of each item in pounds

item_dimensions.description: Dimensions of each item as 'length x width x height' in inches

packaging_type.description: Packaging type: box, envelope, tube, or auto

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: items, item_weights, and item_dimensions arrays must have the same length
Invalid weight values: All weights must be positive numbers
Invalid dimension format: Use 'length x width x height' format with numeric values
Invalid packaging type: Must be 'box', 'envelope', 'tube', or 'auto'
Packaging constraints exceeded: Items too large or heavy for selected packaging type
usage: Provide arrays of items, item_weights, and item_dimensions with matching lengths. Optionally specify packaging_type and fragile handling. Returns calculated package specifications.

package_dimensions.description: Final package dimensions as 'length x width x height' in inches

billable_weight.description: Higher of actual weight or dimensional weight
